comments.body: NGL the link looks sus. Please dont promote such links on this sub
I'm an alumni and just wanted to help out you guys. If you're not interested to apply, then just ignore dude.
We would love to hear more from our alumni.. since you just posted a link, we were not sure how to react. I would sincerely request you to add a small description and a more genuine looking link. :)

[https://iusstf.org/documents/35627/42091/Viterbi%20Flyer%202023-24](https://iusstf.org/documents/35627/42091/Viterbi%20Flyer%202023-24)  
I'm really sorry for the harsh comment btw
